last_episode_to_air.name: Justice?
last_episode_to_air.overview: Faria's daughter shares her own terrible story of abuse and manipulation. "John of God" faces a reckoning while survivors try to move forward.

name: John of God: The Crimes of a Spiritual Healer
original_name: João de Deus: Cura e Crime
overview: Idolized medium João Teixeira de Faria rises to international fame before horrifying abuse is revealed by survivors, prosecutors and the press.

episodes.name: The Healer
episodes.overview: Tales of miracles lure thousands to João Teixeira de Faria's spiritual surgery facility in central Brazil. Some leave "healed," others forever scarred.

episodes.name: The Scandal
episodes.overview: Profits and influence grow, as do the accusations, complicating Faria and his inner circle's plans to build an international brand and business.

episodes.name: The Trial
episodes.overview: Emboldened by the mounting charges against "John of God," survivors band together — and build a damning case against their abuser.

episodes.name: Justice?
episodes.overview: Faria's daughter shares her own terrible story of abuse and manipulation. "John of God" faces a reckoning while survivors try to move forward.
